title: Thought 1
copy: What is the next thought you are about to have?

title: Thought 2
copy: Notice the next 5 thoughts you are about to have.

title: Thought 3
copy: Who is observing the thought "I am"?

title: Thought 4
copy: Can you observe the space in which thoughts are occurring?

title: Thought 5
copy: Observe the space *in between* your thoughts.

title: Thought 6
copy: With your eyes open, notice the next 10 thoughts.
